amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 18 which established a pilot program that allowed the United States Patent Trade Office to review certain low-quality business method patents.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in Part B of House Report 112-111 to strike section 18 of H.R. 1249, the Transitional program for covered business method patents.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schock amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 262, 1 Present (Roll no. 489).
